review_details: Best place in town!Colorful, aesthetic high-style corner wine bar, outside comfortable social distancing sitting, indoors spacious atmospheric dining room Cosmopolitan with Mediterranean touch and tastes kitchen, masterful cooking and beautifully decorated dishes, friendly personalized service attentive to details; and above all, the most welcoming, friendly with a warm smile manager, Periklis ready to ‚Äúnavigate‚Äù you through their extensive wine list and take you for a look down stairs, to their spectacular wine cellar No doubt, a must place when in old town Nafplion

reviewTitle: A wonderful place for Sunday lunch!
review_details: A wonderful place, beautiful open air environment, distance sitting, friendly, personalized service with all the ‚Äútreasures of the sea‚Äù, fresh - fresh , masterfully prepared, large, generous servings, best value for money!! We really enjoyed our Sunday lunch with our friends A must visit place, when in Glyf√°da

A so pleasant surprise, a small hidden treasure up in the mountains outside the picturesque village of Arnea, on the way to the Byzantine-time monasteries of Mount Athos!! Beautiful family wooden suites, having the restaurant on the premises! Warm atmosphere, fireplace burning at the corner, nice selection of wines, creative dishes based on local recipes, friendly service! Worthwhile exploring if you are in the area!!

Went for family dinner while visiting "Pollonia", we were staying in Plaka, and we had the most pleasant dining nexperience. Friendly and welcoming service, beautiful dishes, creative cooking, superb tastes, and a good selection of white wines!!

Chartered ‚ÄúPoseidon‚Äù as a family with our skipper, captain Andreas!
Sailed from picturesque ‚ÄúPollonia‚Äù in the morning, we spent the day touring the southern part of Milos, visiting spectacular beaches, most known the magical one, called ‚ÄúKleftiko‚Äù!!
Captain Andreas was a great companion and host making continuously sure that we have everything, from a tasty breakfast to a gourmet-style ‚Äúfruit de mer‚Äù lunch (fresh shrimps, pasta dishes), cooled white wine, etc!!
A relaxing and enjoyable day, the best way to explore Milos and see beaches that you can‚Äôt reach from land!!!
Highly recommended!!

Lovely place by the sea with nice shade, best for a comfortable and tasty meal!!
Three brothers own the place, one of them is a fisherman so ask for the catch of the day!!
Delicious dishes, salads, the local Cretan ‚Äúdakos‚Äù and tasty local desserts!!
A must place to visit

A nice long beach, beautiful scenery and deep blue clear waters!! Offers sun beds and umbrellas, fresh water showers, and happily no music!!

Just across the street, nice restaurants with delicious local Cretan cuisine, the local grapa called ‚Äútsikoudia‚Äù and fresh fish!!!

Accessible by road, 1,5 hour from Chania!

On our way from Loutro to Sougia, the boat made a stop at Aghia Roumeli!
A friend had recommended this place and we went for lunch!
The owner Mr Prokopis was friendly and welcoming and whatever he suggested was well cooked and tasty!!
The service was attentive and overall we were pleased! Reasonably priced, good value for money!

We came to Aegina for the wedding of the son of a very good friend of ours! They booked us at Xanthippi hotel, an excellent choice!
Located on the breezy side of the island, it is a new hotel, impeccably clean, all rooms with a view to the sea and beautiful gardens!

Breakfast is very nice with lots of choices, and it‚Äôs restaurant is a must for a lovely, atmospheric dinner!

The owner Nikos, a very friendly and sophisticated person, will be also very willing to tell you on what to do, what to see and where to eat all over the island.
All the staff is also very well mannered, friendly and willing to assist you with anything you need!

If Aegina is your destination, definitely worth of considering ‚ÄúXanthippi‚Äù for your stay on the island.

Aegina is a large island and definitely you need a car to enjoy and explore it!! A must visit is the ancient ‚Äútemple of Afaia‚Äù, very well preserved with a panoramic view!!

reviewTitle: A lovely place for home-cooking lunch and dinnerüòä
review_details:
What a lovely find this family-run taverna!!
Fresh-fresh seafood and fish, cooked to perfection! Local ingredients, garden grown veggies, tomatoes,cucumbers, peppers, you name it ... with original taste!!
Just delicious Manolis, the owner will welcome you with a huge smile and very gentle, polite manners; Erasmia, his wife and cook, a lovable, friendly person and a caring mother; and daughter Michaela, a great helper and hard working young girl, will make sure you have everything for a lovely meal!
A must: broiled sardines, broiled or fried baby squid (Kalamari); baby red mallets (barbounia), fish soup and broiled big fish!!
Tasty home made fresh salads, and season fruits Located on the north eastern side of the island, in Vagia village..

In the traditional neighborhood of Petralona, a beautiful family run boutique restaurant, ‚ÄúXryssa‚Äù Everything home made, a little patience is needed because all dishes are prepared on order Just delicious All four dishes we ordered, were made to perfection and the most interesting one, chicken fillet staffed with baby lobster Definitely good value for money

What a spectacular seafood restaurant with a very atmospheric wine bar and an extensive wine list of eclectic wines!! Large fish is the specialty and they can do very creative cooking, starting with carpaccio, slicing into half and broil it and the rest make a delicious fish frikasse dish
Impeccable and friendly service is a high feature and makes it a very comfortable place ta have a superb and relaxing dinner!
Our second time there and both times we were extremely satisfied with the food, atmosphere - smoke free and service!!
Easy to become a regular customer!

reviewTitle: a very nice and comfortable flight
review_details: Although a low cost airline, I was happily surprised by the nice attitude of the personnel and the comfort and quality of service

What a wonderful little, lovely place in an authentic neighborhood of Venice, not flooded with crowds! Beautiful atmosphere, friendly service and lovely jazzy music in the background!
All dishes delicious, the one that we really loved the most, was the ‚Äúmonkfish‚Äù!!!
If you don‚Äôt mind going a bit out of the main path, it‚Äôs worthwhile going to this family restaurant!! Make a booking, doesn‚Äôt have many tables..

Back at our favorite ‚ÄúDion‚Äù taverna in Delphi with George welcoming us with his big smile and friendly hospitality
Food as usual superb, local delicacies, tasty dishes, large portions and delicious yogurt with homemade sweets (on the house) Excellent value for money!!
When in Delphi, make sure you go, all day starting with lunch until late dinner

Back to our familiar Giacomo today with good friends!!! As usual, very welcoming, charming atmosphere, and friendly service The menu remains exceptional and all the dishes are aesthetically beautiful and delicious

reviewTitle: An atmospheric restaurant in a beautiful old style buildingüëç
review_details:
Located in the old city in Knoxville, a trendy area with beautiful restaurants and bars near the Market square, this place is an exquisite gourmet restaurant with a most innovative menu and delectable dishes Impeccable service, atmospheric interior with the ‚Äúopen kitchen‚Äù concept, a highly attractive feature to see the chef and the staff preparing live the food and an extensive list!!
A sure place for a fabulous dinner night

An artistic coffee place in the heart of the harbor in Gavrio, nice breeze in the morning and good WiFi service!
Known for its delicious ‚Äúloukoumades‚Äù, excellent coffee, freshly squeezed juices and a big variety of breakfast, omelettes and light lunch, salads, etc..
Friendly service, one of the few places open all year round!!
Felt very comfortable sitting here, read our news papers, catch up on our mails and relax!! Today Sunday we came for our last coffee before taking the boat for back to Athens!! This of course, was not our first visit to Andros and will not be the last..

reviewTitle: Panoramic view of the peaks of mythical mountain Olympus, overlooking the Enipeas gorge!!
review_details:
Traditional cuisine with well cooked dishes, local specialities and a great variety of recipes! Generous portions using ingredients and products from the area, influenced by the local flavors!! Friendly service and in the summer, you can sit outside looking at the busy main square of the village, Litohoron and saint Nikolaos church!
Overall, good value for money!!

Across from the Church of Aghios Nikolaos on the main street of Litohoron, this beautiful bakery exceeds your expectations not only in bread varieties but also to home made sweets and cookies, health bars, coffee etc!!
But what makes you like this place more is the very friendly and welcoming staff, always willing to serve you with a big smile no matter how busy they may be!!
Congrats!!

reviewTitle: Not a site, but a tremendous archaeological park!
review_details:
Ancient Dion, the religious center of Alexander the Great and his father Philip, dedicated to Zeus and the Gods of Olympos!! The stunning peaks of Olympos with Zeus throne are overlooking Dion and this is the place, which has the actual altar where Alexander did his sacrifices before starting his monumental expedition against the Persian empire to the east, that took him all the way to the Hindu river (at the border of India)!!
You need ample time to really walk through the Park, the largest of it‚Äôs kind, and enjoy and marvel its treasures!! Thanks to Professor Dimitris Pantermalis (nowadays Director of the impressive new Athens Acropolis Museum) and his team of dedicated young archaeologists, the ancient ruins of Dion have been transformed into this wonderful park, highly educational and enjoyable)!!!
Next to the Park, is also the ancient theater, still active to date and the new museum with its beautiful architecture and wonderful exhibits!!
One of the most spectacular is the ‚Äúhydravlis‚Äù, one of the most well preserved musical instruments playing with water!!!
A must visit, if you are in the area!!

Good Friday in old Corfu town! Following the impressive procession of the Cathedral epitaph with the three philharmonic orchestras and masses of people, we came to the Venetian well for a late dinner
Elegant and civilized environment, lively and full with customers! Impeccable service and a wide variety of wines and a very knowledgeable Sommelier guiding you through to make the correct choice!!
Creative cooking and delicious dishes, appreciated that they made traditional Corfu dishes special for the feast period (non meat)!! I had a delectable ‚Äúpastitsada with octopus‚Äù

reviewTitle: Attending a conference in Delhi Cultural Center
review_details:
Back a year later to our lovely and friendly taverna, Dion! George the owner was there with his big smile ready to take good care of us and we had another superb evening!! Everything we ate was delicious, homemade cooking and generous portions! Nice red and white wine and at the end, on the house, we were treated to homemade yoghurt and syrupy fruit!
A must place not to be missed when you are in Delhi town

Atmospheric place on the busy Mitropoleos street in the center of Athens! Gourmet tasty dishes with recipes selected from various traditional areas of Greece, organic food and an endless selection of wines A unique feature is the flexibility to do a wide-range of wine tasting by the glass or even half-glass with the friendly and highly informative guidance of the Shop‚Äôs sommelier It‚Äôs a must place, if downtown

reviewTitle: Elegant bar restaurant in old town Athens, "Metaxourgio"!
review_details:
Beautiful place with very tasty interior and a fantastic garden for the summer time! Atmospheric bar for a drink before dining! Wonderful gourmet dishes and friendly service.
Good value for money!

reviewTitle: Well organized, colorful beachfront under the Venetian castle, Palamidi!
review_details: Full service, nice sun-proof umbrellas to jump into the sea, excellent coffee, fresh juices and smoothies, gourmet Mediterranean cuisine, beach bar in the evening!! What else, it has it all!!

Conveniently located by the harbor, this restaurant is particularly popular with younger crowds, although all ages go!! Very busy on the weekends, food especially good and the dishes are very tasty, not to talk about the pizzas, exceptionally yummy!! Very friendly and fast service!

One of my favorite beaches in Greece! Love getting there, jogging from Arvanitia alongside the coastline under Palamidi. There several beach bars with full service and umbrellas!! My favorite is "Utopia", friendly people, Giorgos the boss, always with a huge smile, and Thodoris, the barista, makes for me one of the best coffee latte ever!!

A lovely garden welcomes you in a beautiful restaurant! In the summer time, always convenient to go for a bite after a summer movie Two cinemas in the area, Riviera and Box!! All the dishes and the specials of the day, are just wonderfulNice house wine and very friendly service, make the place irresistible

The best!! Our favorite beach on the island!! Crystal clear waters with pebbles!
In the eight days we stayed in Alonissos, went three times. We preferred to go late in the afternoon, and always found umbrellas!!

reviewTitle: Wonderful seafood lunch by the waterfrontüåà
review_details: A most friendly and welcoming place with home-made cooking! The Owner Panagiotis is all over making sure everything is done to perfection, his wife oversees the kitchen and the preparation of the food and the dishes, and their children and fianc√©es are on the serving with huge smiles and customer-oriented attitude!! A must place when in Alonissos, for a superb swim and wonderful seafood

A very beautiful, atmospheric garden restaurant with very fine recipes and Mediterranean dishes!! The whole family is there to welcome you and take really good care of you while dining! The owner Yanis with his eloquent style, his lovely wife Emma and their three children are extremely friendly and attentive!! Very tasty cooking and excellent house wine! A good value for money, well spent!!

reviewTitle: For a nice ice cream after a lovely seafood dinner, at Arapakos!
review_details: What can someone say about this wonderful GelateriaThe ice cream - gelato & sorbet flavors unique and spectacular, endless choices and authentic Italian tastesBut most important, the genuine friendliness of Roberto and his lovely wife that make you feel so welcome and personal

The best seafood taverna in the center of Athens, off Omonia square!!
Decorated in fishing-island style, offers daily a fantastic fish soup, and all seafood and fish are always very fresh and grilled to perfection! ‚õµÔ∏èOwner' s daughters, Theano and Niki are there to welcome you and take really good, personal care of every customer!! Plenty of local people eat there, a sure sign of good and consistent quality

Œ§Œø show œÑŒøœÖ ŒºŒ±Œ≥Œ±Œ∂ŒπŒøœç ŒµŒπŒΩŒ±Œπ œÑŒø "œÜŒªŒ±ŒºœÄŒ≠ œÉŒ±Œ≥Œ±ŒΩŒ¨Œ∫Œπ", œÄŒøœÖ ŒºŒµ œÑœåœÉŒ∑ ŒºŒ±ŒµœÉœÑœÅŒØŒ± œÉŒµœÅŒ≤ŒØœÅŒµŒπ Œø chef!! A must place when in Nafplion

reviewTitle: Œ§œÅŒπœÉœáŒ±œÅŒπœÑœâŒºŒµŒΩŒø œÑŒ±Œ≤ŒµœÅŒΩŒ¨Œ∫Œπ œÉœÑŒ± œÉœÑŒµŒΩŒøœÉŒøŒ∫Œ±Œ∫Œ± œÑŒøœÖ ŒùŒ±œÖœÄŒªŒØŒøœÖüéâ
review_details: Friendly service, tasty dishes and beautiful salads, a menu with great variety of choices!! What else can you ask for when you are in old-town Nafplion! The epitome to have a superb meal, lunch or even more romantic, dinner in the evening!! A beautiful place, highly recommended

Friendly and professional service, a must for "serious" fish & seafood lovers!! A great variety of starters and appetizers, fantastic salads and the fish is always fresh and cooked to perfection! Kostas and Dimitris are there ready to take good care of you and the chef ‚Äç is performing his "cooking miracles" every night!
Perfect location by the harbor, outdoor sitting on a beautiful pedestrian promenade

reviewTitle: A maritime museum on a mountainous village!
review_details:
Not very well known that Litohoron although built on the slopes of mountain Olympos, has a great maritime tradition! "Thermaikos" gulf is down the hill, only 3,5Km! The tradition originates centuries back when Konstantinoupolis was taken over by the Ottomans, many people fled the capture and came across the Aegean Sea, some of them to this strategically located place! A large portion of the male population is mariners on commercial ships and they own their own shipping companies in Thessaloniki! Litohorites helped the admiral of the Greek navy, Votsis during the Balkan wars in the early 1900s!
Worthwhile visiting the museum if you go to Litohoron, is conveniently located down in the park, next to thevMunicipal hall.

reviewTitle: For an exquisite dinner out in the old town of Plaka!
review_details: Lovely, charming place with very tasty interior decoration! Creative cooking with a wide range of choices for breakfast, branch and dinner!! Our salad was exceptionally tasty and the main dishes just fantastic, black angus beef "taliates" and "synagrida" fish with fennelExtensive wine list also! Very friendly, attentive and welcoming staff
